known_issues: Guest login flow regression: user cannot enter the app after completing the guest name screen; it returns to the main login page.

existing_features.title: Fix the guest login flow so that after submitting the guest name form (screen title: "Welcome, Guest"), the app reliably transitions into the authenticated app experience (dashboard) instead of returning to the main login page.

Update guest session state propagation so all components using the guest auth hook observe guest session changes immediately after guest login and logout (even when different components call the hook independently).

projectName: Fix guest name screen regression so guest can enter the app
